text: @RonBrownstein You math is spot on. Problem is the people of those states elected their gop governors...therefore, they too are glad everything is open and no one HAS to wear a mask. In AZ, there is a base that doesn’t believe COVID-19 poses a threat...stupid is as stupid does?
